name: trump-card
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. PP remaining | Power ------------ | ----: 4 or more | 40 3 | 50 2 | 60 1 | 80 0 | 200 If this move is activated by another move, the activating moveâ€™s PP is used to calculate power.
short_effect: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.
flavor_text: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.
